meaningMnemonic: If you only <kanji>take</kanji> <kanji>daring</kanji> and you don't have any yourself, you only have it <vocabulary>for the time being</vocabulary>. It will go away if you can't make it yourself.
readingMnemonic: This word uses the kun'yomi readings for the kanji. You learned both of these already, so you should be able to read this with no problems!
